author: billbarker
msg: Fix NPE when now sink is supplied.

Previously, you could hit this by having maxSavePostSize=4K, and POSTing more than 4K worth of data to a protected page with FORM auth.  Now the code throws an IOE farther down, which is handled correctly by FormAuthenticator.
